example_name_request:
Examples:

• 10% discount

• Discount on e-bike renting

• 1 hour of free parking
no_request:
There are no offers for this POS.
Create one by tapping on the + button.
wom_age_suggestion: Indicates the maximum age of accepted WOM vouchers (in days).
wom_age_warning: By not using this filter, you will accept vouchers of any age.
insert_value_grather: Insert a value greater than 0 and lower than 1000
error_text_amount: Number must be greater than zero
insert_service_price: The number of WOM vouchers required to unlock the offer
aim_suggestion: Indicates the aim for which accepted WOM vouchers must have been generated.
aim_warning: If you do not specify an aim, you will accept vouchers of any kind.
no_connection_desc: To gather or spend WOM vouchers your device needs to be connected to the Internet
no_connection_aim_desc:
Since this is the first time launching the app you need an active Internet connection to download all necessary data to configure your POS.
Turn your network connection on and tap on “Try again”.
no_connection_transaction_desc:
To generate a payment request your device needs to have an active Internet connection.
Turn your network connection on and tap on “Try again”.
selection_pos_suggestion: Tap here to select the POS to manage
welcome_desc: With this tool you’ll have direct access to your WOM Point of Service, with the ability to create discounts and offers in exchange for efforts towards the common good.
merchant_desc:
In order to create and promote offers on the platform, you must be registered as a Merchant.
Register now, if you haven’t already, or proceed anonymously.
wom_desc: Most individual actions generate social value. This value can be quantified in terms of WOMs, vouchers included in the list of social and digital innovation instruments of the European Commission.
wom_suggestion_desc: Every WOM voucher is equivalent to one minute of effort. By becoming a Merchant, you can freely decide how to compensate the efforts by WOM volunteers towards the common good with goods, discount, and services.
no_merchants: You don’t have any Merchant paired with your account. Register as a Merchant now and create your POS.
login_insufficient_pos: The login was successful, but there are no Merchants or POS registered for your account.
title: Title
titleOfferDesc: Pick an enticing title that expresses the content of your offer clearly.
descriptionOfferDesc: A detailed description helps users understanding the offer and its conditions. If there are limitations and restrictions, put them here.
womNumberDesc: Set the amount of WOMs needed to unlock the offer.
titleMinLengthWarning: The title needs to be at least 6 characters long.
noZeroWomWarning: You must require one WOM or more.
bounding_box_help: Define the size of your geographical bounding box by dragging the slider. You can move the center point of the bounding box by clicking on the map.
aimDesc: If set, you will accept only WOM vouchers generated with this specific aim.
bounding_box_desc: If set, you will accept only WOM vouchers generated within the specified geographical area.
wom_age_desc: If set, you will accept only more recent WOM vouchers, generated at most a given number of days in the past.
persistent_offer_desc: This offer can be used multiple times, by different users, and will always remain valid. The WOM Pocket app will show it to nearby users and you will be able to print and display the offer in your shop.
ephemeral_offer_desc: This offer can only be used once and it will be registered on this POS only. Use this option to create ‘disposable’ offers for single users.
minLengthWarn2: The minimum number of characters is
handlePosDesc: Edit the title, description, and cover image of your POS
name: Name
createYourMerchant: Create your Merchant on our website
backHereAndLogin: , then come back here and log in again
noMerchant: The login was successful, but you don’t have a Merchant linked to your account.
anonymousTypeOfferSelectorMessage: Note: anonymous users cannot create public offers.
doYouWantDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your profile and all its data?
doYouWantDeleteAccountDesc: By confirming this operation you will lose access to your data and won’t be able to manage your
summary_tip: Once an offer has been published, you will no longer be able to modify it. But you can cancel existing offers and create new ones at any time.
no_permission_to_create: You cannot generate public offers, which can be used by multiple users and are promoted to WOM volunteers, because you do not have administrative rights on this POS. Contact the administrator of Merchant to create public offers.
invalid_fiscal_code: The Fiscal Code or VAT number appears to be not valid
fiscal_code_already_used: The Fiscal Code or VAT number appears to be already in use
validation_error: There is a validation error in one of the fields
merchant_creation_error: Sorrz, an error occurred while creating your Merchant.
merchant_fiscal_code: Italian Codice Fiscale or VAT number
minimum_chars_warning: Must be at least {} characters long
max_chars_warning: You exceeded the maximum amount of characters
terms_and_conditions: By registering, you accept terms and conditions of the WOM platform.
sign_up_error: Sorry, an error occurred while registering your account
email_sent:
We’ve sent a verification e-mail to your address {}.

Tap on the link in the e-mail to confirm your profile and then come back to the app and tap the button below.
didnt_receive_email: You haven’t received any e-mail? Please check the spam folder or tap the button below to request a new verification link.
wait_seconds: Wait {} seconds before requesting a new link
